resources.string: select b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id where (enName like ? OR arName like ? ) limit %1$s,%2$s

select b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid where (enName like ? OR arName like ? ) AND favorite=1 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase

select b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.enDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid where (enName like ? OR arName like ? ) AND ic.categoryid like ? limit %1$s,%2$s

select c._id,c.id,c.arName name,count(ic.itemId) entities from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where (c.enName like ? or c.arName like ? or searchText like ?) and type=%3$s group by c.id order by count(ic.itemId) desc limit %1$s,%2$s
